item.title: Report X-2024091343
item.description:
Report X-2024091343

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-23T09:15:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-31
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PSC CALLED FOR PACKAGE LEAKING FLOUR. SUBSEQUENT DAMAGE INSPECTION REVEALED AEROSOL CANS OF MAZOLA CANOLA COOKING SPRAY, BUT NO MAZ MAT LABELS ON OUTSIDE OF PACKAGE. UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROTOCAL INITIATED.

item.title: Report X-2024091128
item.description:
Report X-2024091128

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-19T09:21:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-05
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION, DISCOVERED FLAMMABLE LIQUID HAZARD DIAMOND ON BUCKET CONTAINED WITHIN PACKAGE. NO LABEL ON OUTSIDE OF BOX. INITIATED UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROCEDURE.
